nodes.text: The Red Band Rebels was an organization based on the planet Cadinth during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. The combat surgeon Archiban Kimble, better known as Doc, worked with the Rebels for a time.
Fashaka was first mentioned in the Codex entry for the Jedi Knight companion character Doc in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
